projects.title: PokeVault
projects.description: A playful, high-fidelity interface for managing Pokémon TCG collections with rarity scoring and animated card interactions.

projects.title: Tokyo Glass
projects.description: A beautiful glassmorphism-inspired travel planning experience showcasing Tokyo destinations with smooth animations and dark/light mode

pokevault.title: PokeVault
pokevault.subtitle: Pokémon TCG Collection Manager
pokevault.description: A premium, motion-driven portfolio manager for Pokémon Trading Card Game collections. Features real-time search, rarity analytics, portfolio value tracking, and stunning card reveal animations with glass morphism UI.
pokevault.overview: Built an immersive collection management platform with advanced card search, portfolio analytics, and premium micro-interactions. Features include debounced search with TCGdex API integration, animated card grids with stagger effects, portfolio value charts with multiple timeframes, rarity distribution visualization, and a glass morphism design system with theme support.

features.title: Animated Card Interactions
features.description: Spring-based animations with hover lift effects, scale transforms, and staggered entrance animations for a premium feel

features.title: Real-Time Search
features.description: Debounced search integration with TCGdex API, featuring evolution filtering and instant card discovery

features.title: Portfolio Analytics
features.description: Interactive charts showing portfolio value over time with multiple timeframe views and rarity breakdown visualizations

features.title: Glass Morphism UI
features.description: Modern glass-effect design system with backdrop blur, theme support, and smooth transitions

tokyo-glass.title: Tokyo Glass
tokyo-glass.subtitle: Discover Tokyo through a modern glassmorphism interface
tokyo-glass.description: Tokyo Glass is an immersive travel planning experience that showcases Tokyo destinations through a beautiful glassmorphism design. The application features smooth animations, interactive destination cards, and a seamless dark/light mode toggle. Built with modern React patterns, it demonstrates advanced UI techniques including floating orbs, glass cards, and responsive layouts. The project highlights key Tokyo destinations like Shibuya, Senso-ji Temple, Mt. Fuji, and Akihabara, each with their own interactive card experience.
tokyo-glass.overview: Tokyo Glass is an immersive travel planning experience that showcases Tokyo destinations through a beautiful glassmorphism design. The application features smooth animations, interactive destination cards, and a seamless dark/light mode toggle. Built with modern React patterns, it demonstrates advanced UI techniques including floating orbs, glass cards, and responsive layouts.

features.title: Glassmorphism UI Design
features.description: Beautiful glass-effect design with backdrop blur effects creating a modern, premium aesthetic

features.title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
features.description: Smooth theme transitions with seamless dark/light mode switching for optimal viewing experience

features.title: Interactive Destination Cards
features.description: Engaging destination cards with hover animations showcasing key Tokyo locations

features.title: Floating Orb Animations
features.description: Dynamic floating orb background animations adding depth and visual interest

features.title: Responsive Grid Layout
features.description: Adaptive 5:7 split layout on desktop with mobile-first responsive design

features.title: Accessibility Features
features.description: Comprehensive accessibility with skip links, ARIA labels, and full keyboard navigation support

features.title: Stats Grid
features.description: Visual trip metrics display showcasing key statistics and information

features.title: Curated Experiences
features.description: Feature cards highlighting curated Tokyo experiences and destinations

features.title: Smooth Animations
features.description: Premium Framer Motion animations throughout for a polished, fluid user experience
